original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṁ gihigataṁ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham saṅghena asammatam vuṭṭhāpenti

original: “etha, sikkhamānā, imaṁ jānātha, imaṁ detha, imaṁ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṁ kappiyaṁ karothā”ti.
analyzed: etha sikkhamānāḥ imam jānātha imam detha imam āharatha iminā atthaḥ imam kappiyam karotha ati

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṁ gihigataṁ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham saṅghena a sammatam vuṭṭhāpessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṁ gihigataṁ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham saṅghena asammatam vuṭṭhāpenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṁ gihigataṁ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham saṅghena a sammatam vuṭṭhāpessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya gihigatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ dātuṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassāya gihi gatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya vuṭṭhāna sammutim dātu

original: Tāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya gihigatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya
analyzed: tāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassāya gihi gatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya

original: saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ
analyzed: saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā bhikkhunīnam pāde vanditvā ukkuṭika
nisīditvā añjalim paggahetvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘ahaṁ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassā gihigatā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā, saṅghaṁ vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ yācāmī’ti.
analyzed: aha ayye itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassā gihi gatā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā saṅgham vuṭṭhāna sammutim yācāmi iti

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassā gihigatā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṅghaṁ vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ yācati.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassā gihi gatā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā saṅgham vuṭṭhāna sammutim yācati

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya gihigatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ dadeyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassāya gihi gatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya vuṭṭhāna sammutim dadeyya

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassā gihigatā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṅghaṁ vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ yācati.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassā gihi gatā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā saṅgham vuṭṭhāna sammutim yācati

original: Saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya gihigatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ deti.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassāya gihi gatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya vuṭṭhāna sammutim deti

original: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya gihigatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṁ, sā tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassāya gihi gatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya vuṭṭhāna sammutiyā sā tuṇhassa

original: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya gihigatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammuti.
analyzed: dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassāya gihi gatāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya vuṭṭhāna sammuti

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbhara tāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṁ gihigataṁ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham saṅghena a sammatam vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti.
analyzed: ñatti dutiyena kammena vuṭṭhāna sammuti na dinnā hoti

original: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṁ vā ācariniṁ vā pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā pariyesati, sīmaṁ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāpessāmi iti gaṇam vā ācarinim vā pattam vā cīvaram vā pariyesati sīmam vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa
kamma vācā pariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa
dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā vuṭṭhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
dhamma kamme vematikāḥ vuṭṭhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā vuṭṭhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
adhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṁ gihigataṁ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ saṅghena sammataṁ vuṭṭhāpeti,
analyzed: paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham saṅghena sammatam vuṭṭhāpeti
